entries.loiter_s2: No loitering here. Move along, citizen.
entries.loiter_s1: Move along, citizen. There's no loitering here.
entries.bark_s3: I don't care much for you, citizen. You'd better stay in line.
entries.bark_s2: Be careful, citizen. Those Rebel scum have been sighted in the area.
entries.bark_s1: Stay out of trouble, citizen. Do not make us detain you.
entries.follow_lost: This is %TO. I lost track of the target... keep your eyes open. Returning to my post.
entries.follow_giveup: This is %TO. It's nothing. Everything appears normal. Returning to my post.
entries.follow_start: This is %TO. I see someone suspicious... checking it out.
entries.rebel_breach: All units be advised. Be on the lookout for suspected Rebel sympathizer, %TO.
